mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) rowcount$$ FROM (SELECT P.* FROM $WORKITEMTABLENAME$ P WHERE P.CREATEUSER = #USERGUID# UNION SELECT P.* FROM $WORKITEMTABLENAME$ P WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SA_USER A_ INNER JOIN PPM_TASKRESOURCE B_ ON A_.GUID = B_.USERGUID WHERE B_.TASKGUID = P.GUID AND A_.GUID = #USERGUID# ) UNION SELECT P.* FROM $WORKITEMTABLENAME$ P WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM PPM_PROJECTROLE Y INNER JOIN PPM_ROLEMEMBERS Z ON Y.GUID = Z.PROJECTROLEGUID WHERE P.RELATIONPROJECT = Y.TYPEGUID AND (UPPER(Y.ROLEID) = 'MANAGERROLE' OR UPPER(Y.ROLEID) = 'RECEIVER') AND Z.USERGUID = #USERGUID# ) ) A WHERE 1=1
SELECT COUNT(1) rowcount$$ FROM $WORKITEMTABLENAME$ A WHERE 1=1
